strategy.summary: INVERTIR - Este es un ganador. Alto crecimiento y alta contribución al profit.
INVERTIR - Producto estrella con excelente margen.
ANALIZAR - Alto crecimiento pero baja contribución. Decidir: invertir para convertir en Star.

insights.STAR: Your Stars (Tacos al Pastor, Guacamole) are driving growth! Invest in marketing and consider premium variations.
insights.CASH_COW: Cash Cows (Quesadilla, Arroz con Pollo, Nachos) generate steady revenue. Maintain quality and optimize costs.
insights.QUESTION_MARK: Question Marks (Birria Tacos, Elote) show potential. Consider promotional campaigns to increase market share.
insights.DOG: Dogs (Ensalada, Sopa, Flan) have low performance. Evaluate if they should be repositioned or removed.

ai_insights.portfolio_assessment: Tu menú muestra una mezcla saludable con Stars fuertes impulsando el crecimiento y Cash Cows confiables generando ingresos estables.
ai_insights.recommendations: Enfoca marketing en Stars, optimiza costos de Cash Cows, evalúa Question Marks para inversión y considera renovar Dogs.

campaigns.title: Taco Tuesday Fiesta
campaigns.target_audience: Young professionals aged 25-40 who love authentic Mexican food

copy.social_media:
🌮 TACO TUESDAY IS HERE! 🌮

Our legendary Tacos al Pastor are calling your name! Marinated pork, fresh pineapple, cilantro perfection.

🔥 $2 OFF all tacos today!
📍 [Location]

#TacoTuesday #TacosAlPastor #AuthenticMexican
copy.email_subject: 🌮 Your Taco Tuesday Deal is Ready!
copy.email_body:
Hey foodie!

We know you've been craving our famous Tacos al Pastor. Today's the day!

Get $2 OFF all tacos this Tuesday. Our slow-marinated pork with fresh pineapple is waiting for you.

See you soon!
- The MenuPilot Demo Restaurant Team

campaigns.expected_impact: 15-25% increase in taco sales, 10% increase in overall Tuesday traffic
campaigns.rationale: Tacos al Pastor is our top Star product. A dedicated promotion day builds habit and drives consistent traffic.

campaigns.title: Birria Buzz Campaign
campaigns.objective: Convert Question Mark to Star by increasing market share
campaigns.target_audience: Food trend followers and social media influencers

copy.social_media:
🔥 THE BIRRIA EXPERIENCE 🔥

Dip. Bite. Repeat.

Our Birria Tacos come with rich consommé that'll change your life. Slow-braised beef, melted cheese, pure magic.

📸 Tag us for a chance to win FREE birria for a month!

#BirriaTacos #FoodTrend #MustTry
copy.email_subject: Have You Tried Our Viral Birria Tacos? 🔥
copy.email_body:
The internet is obsessed with Birria Tacos, and ours are the real deal.

Slow-braised beef, gooey cheese, and that iconic consommé for dipping. It's not just a meal – it's an experience.

Come see what the hype is about!

First-timers get 15% off with code: BIRRIA15

campaigns.expected_impact: 40% increase in Birria Taco orders, strong social media engagement
campaigns.rationale: Birria is trending nationally. Capitalizing on this trend can convert this Question Mark into a Star.

campaigns.title: Family Feast Bundle
campaigns.objective: Maximize Cash Cow revenue through bundling

copy.social_media:
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 FAMILY FEAST DEAL 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Feed the whole crew without breaking the bank!

🍽️ 4 Quesadillas
🍽️ 2 Arroz con Pollo
🍽️ 1 Nachos Supreme
🥤 4 Drinks

ALL FOR $49.99 (Save $15!)

#FamilyDinner #MexicanFood #ValueDeal
copy.email_body:
Family dinner just got easier AND cheaper!

Our Family Feast Bundle includes:
• 4 Quesadillas de Queso
• 2 Arroz con Pollo plates
• 1 Nachos Supreme to share
• 4 Drinks

All for just $49.99 (normally $65)!

Perfect for busy weeknights. Order online for pickup or delivery.

campaigns.expected_impact: 20% increase in family-sized orders, higher average ticket
campaigns.rationale: Bundling Cash Cows increases average order value while giving customers perceived savings.

campaigns.thought_process: Analyzed BCG matrix to create targeted campaigns. Stars get awareness campaigns, Question Marks get conversion campaigns, and Cash Cows get bundling strategies.

insights: Tacos al Pastor shows upward trend with 15% projected growth
Promotions have higher impact on Question Mark products (+60%)

long_term_insights: Tacos al Pastor has been consistently the star product across 12 sessions
Weekend promotions generate 35% more conversions than weekdays
Average ticket has increased 12% since family bundle implementation

thought_signature.reasoning: Complete BCG portfolio analysis with ML predictions and personalized campaign generation
steps: Multimodal menu extraction with Gemini Vision
BCG classification based on gross profit contribution
Sales prediction with XGBoost + Neural ensemble
